required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate a New Tablet Formulation of Lu AG06466 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: Interventional, Randomized, Open-Label, Crossover, Single-Dose, Relative Bioavailability Study Comparing Two Pharmaceutical Formulations of Lu AG06466 and Investigating the Food Effect on Lu AG06466 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The main goal of this trial is to learn how a new tablet formulation of Lu AG06466 behaves in the body. Researchers will compare the new tablet formulation to the capsule formulation that is currently being tested in other clinical trials. They will measure the levels of the drug in the bloodstream for up to 3 days after participants take either the tablet or the capsule formulation. They will also look at whether the tablet formulation behaves differently when it is taken with and without food.

detailed_description.textblock: This study will consist of 6 sequences with 4 periods (3 days/period) in each sequence. The first 3 periods will be randomized. Each Lu AG06466 dose administration will be separated by a washout period of at least 72 hours.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The first 3 periods will be randomized.

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time Zero to Infinity AUC(0-inf) of Lu AG06466
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
primary_outcome.description: AUC(0-inf) is defined as AUC0-tlast + Clast * t1/2 / ln2 (where Clast is the last quantifiable concentration and t1/2 is the apparent elimination half-life).

primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
primary_outcome.description: AUC(0-inf) is defined as AUC0-tlast + Clast * t1/2 / ln2 (where Clast is the last quantifiable concentration and t1/2 is the apparent elimination half-life).

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under Plasma Concentration-Time Curve from Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUC0-tlast) of Lu AG06466
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of Lu AG06466
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Cmax (Tmax) of Lu AG06466
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Oral Clearance (CL/F) of Lu AG06466
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
primary_outcome.description: CL/F is defined as dose / AUC0-inf.

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vz/F) of Lu AG06466
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
primary_outcome.description: Vz/F is defined as CL/F * t1/2 / ln2.

primary_outcome.measure: Apparent Elimination Half-life (t1/2) of Lu AG06466
primary_outcome.time_frame: 0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
0 (predose) up to 72 hours postdose on Day 1 to Day 12
primary_outcome.description: MR is defined as AUC0-inf, Lu AG06988 / AUC0-inf, Lu AG06466.

arm_group.description: Participants will receive 1 capsule of Lu AG06466 in a fasted state.
Participants will receive 1 tablet of Lu AG06466 in a fasted state.
Participants will receive 1 tablet of Lu AG06466 in a fed state (high-fat meal).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Lu AG06466 Tablet + Antacid, Fasted State
arm_group.description: Participants will receive 1 tablet of Lu AG06466 dosed in combination with antacid in a fasted state.

intervention.arm_group_label: Lu AG06466 Tablet + Antacid, Fasted State
Lu AG06466 Tablet + Antacid, Fasted State

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The participant has a body mass index (BMI) ≥18.5 and ≤30 kg/m^2 at the Screening Visit and at the Baseline Visit.
- The participant is, in the opinion of the investigator, generally healthy based on medical history; a physical examination; vital signs; an electrocardiogram (ECG); and the results of the clinical chemistry, hematology, urinalysis, serology, and other laboratory tests at the Screening Visit and/or the Baseline Visit.
Exclusion Criteria:
- The participant has a personal history of a clinically significant psychiatric disorder (including severe affective disorder, severe anxiety disorder, psychotic tendencies, and drug-induced psychoses).
- The participant has or has had any clinically significant immunological, cardiovascular, respiratory, metabolic, renal, hepatic, gastrointestinal, endocrinological, hematological, dermatological, venereal, neurological, or psychiatric disease or other major disorder.
Other inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply.
